languages.text:
Once the ambull mother loses a third of her maximum wounds, she immediately uses {g|f:0c133569641d4e079d914963cebe015d}Burrow{/g}.
If no targets are on the open terrain she will {g|f:f0bdd2b69d77493590914ae5415c87c8}call her brood{/g} to hunt them.
languages.translation_comment: We have to make it clear that it happens twice in combat: once she loses the first third and once she loses the second third.

traits.locale_text:
Once the ambull mother loses a third of her maximum wounds, she immediately uses {g|f:0c133569641d4e079d914963cebe015d}Burrow{/g}.
If no targets are on the open terrain she will {g|f:f0bdd2b69d77493590914ae5415c87c8}call her brood{/g} to hunt them.

languages.text: Once the ambull mother loses a third of her {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximum wounds{/g} (and later, once she loses two thirds), she immediately uses {g|f:0c133569641d4e079d914963cebe015d}Burrow{/g}, causing her brood to emerge to the surface. She also uses this {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} during her {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} if no targets are located on loose ground.
languages.original_text: Когда амбулл-матка теряет треть от своего {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}максимального здоровья{/g} (и позже, когда она теряет две трети), она немедленно совершает {g|f:0c133569641d4e079d914963cebe015d}Зарывание{/g}, а ее потомство выбирается на поверхность. Также она может применить эту {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}способность{/g} в свой {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ход{/g}, если ни одна цель не находится на рыхлой земле.

traits.locale_text: Once the ambull mother loses a third of her maximum wounds, she immediately uses {g|f:0c133569641d4e079d914963cebe015d}Burrow{/g} causing her brood to emerge on the surface. She also uses this ability during her turn, if no targets are on the open terrain.

Once the ambull mother loses a third of her {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximum wounds{/g} (and later, once she loses two thirds), she immediately uses {g|f:0c133569641d4e079d914963cebe015d}Burrow{/g}, causing her brood to emerge to the surface. She also uses this {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} during her {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} if no targets are located on loose ground.

Once the ambull mother loses a third of her {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximum wounds{/g} (and later, once she loses two thirds), she immediately uses {g|f:0c133569641d4e079d914963cebe015d}Burrow{/g}, causing her brood to emerge to the surface. She also uses this {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} during her {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} if no targets are located on loose ground.

languages.text: Когда амбулл-матка теряет треть от своего {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}максимального здоровья{/g} (и позже, когда она теряет две трети), она немедленно совершает {g|f:0c133569641d4e079d914963cebe015d}Зарывание{/g}, а ее потомство выбирается на поверхность. Также она может применить эту {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}способность{/g} в свой {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ход{/g}, если ни одна цель не находится на рыхлой земле.
languages.translation_comment: We need to make it clear that it happens two times
languages.original_text: Once the ambull mother loses a third of her {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximum wounds{/g} (and later, once she loses two thirds), she immediately uses {g|f:0c133569641d4e079d914963cebe015d}Burrow{/g}, causing her brood to emerge to the surface. She also uses this {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} during her {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} if no targets are located on loose ground.

traits.locale_text: Как только амбулл-матка теряет треть своего запаса здоровья, она немедленно совершает {g|f:0c133569641d4e079d914963cebe015d}Зарывание{/g}, а ее потомство выкапывается на поверхность. Также она может применить эту способность в свой ход, если ни одна цель не находится на мягкой земле.

languages.text: Anne ambul, {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maksimum sağlık{/g} puanının üçte birini kaybettiğinde (sonra da üçte ikisini kaybettiğinde) anında {g|f:0c133569641d4e079d914963cebe015d}Toprağa Gömülerek{/g} yavrularının yüzeye çıkmasına sebep olur. Ayrıca {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turu{/g} esnasında çürük zeminde hiçbir hedef bulunmuyorsa yine bu {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}kabiliyeti{/g} kullanır.
languages.original_text: Once the ambull mother loses a third of her {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximum wounds{/g} (and later, once she loses two thirds), she immediately uses {g|f:0c133569641d4e079d914963cebe015d}Burrow{/g}, causing her brood to emerge to the surface. She also uses this {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} during her {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} if no targets are located on loose ground.

traits.locale_text: Anne ambul, {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maksimum sağlık{/g} puanının üçte birini kaybettiğinde (sonra da üçte ikisini kaybettiğinde) anında {g|f:0c133569641d4e079d914963cebe015d}Toprağa Gömülerek{/g} yavrularının yüzeye çıkmasına sebep olur. Ayrıca {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turu{/g} esnasında çürük zeminde hiçbir hedef bulunmuyorsa yine bu {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}kabiliyeti{/g} kullanır.

languages.text: Cuando la madre ambull pierde un tercio de sus {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}heridas máximas{/g} (y otra vez cuando haya perdido dos tercios), utiliza inmediatamente {g|f:0c133569641d4e079d914963cebe015d}Soterrar{/g}, haciendo que su progenie salga a la superficie. También utilizará esta {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidad{/g} durante su {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g} si no hay ningún objetivo sobre terreno blando.
languages.original_text: Once the ambull mother loses a third of her {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximum wounds{/g} (and later, once she loses two thirds), she immediately uses {g|f:0c133569641d4e079d914963cebe015d}Burrow{/g}, causing her brood to emerge to the surface. She also uses this {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} during her {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} if no targets are located on loose ground.

traits.locale_text: Cuando la madre ambull pierde un tercio de sus {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}heridas máximas{/g} (y otra vez cuando haya perdido dos tercios), utiliza inmediatamente {g|f:0c133569641d4e079d914963cebe015d}Soterrar{/g}, haciendo que su progenie salga a la superficie. También utilizará esta {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidad{/g} durante su {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g} si no hay ningún objetivo sobre terreno blando.

languages.text: 当蚁牛族母失去{g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}最大生命值{/g}的三分之一后（第二次触发是三分之二），它会立刻使用{g|f:0c133569641d4e079d914963cebe015d}钻地{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}，同时召唤它的幼体前往地面。此外，如果没有任何目标处于松散地面上，蚁牛族母也会在自己的{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}内使用此能力。
languages.original_text: Once the ambull mother loses a third of her {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximum wounds{/g} (and later, once she loses two thirds), she immediately uses {g|f:0c133569641d4e079d914963cebe015d}Burrow{/g}, causing her brood to emerge to the surface. She also uses this {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} during her {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} if no targets are located on loose ground.

traits.locale_text: 当蚁牛族母失去{g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}最大生命值{/g}的三分之一后（第二次触发是三分之二），它会立刻使用{g|f:0c133569641d4e079d914963cebe015d}钻地{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}，同时召唤它的幼体前往地面。此外，如果没有任何目标处于松散地面上，蚁牛族母也会在自己的{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}内使用此能力。

languages.text: Quand la mère ambull perd un tiers de ses {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}blessures maximum{/g} (puis quand elle en perd deux tiers), elle utilise immédiatement {g|f:0c133569641d4e079d914963cebe015d}Enfouissement{/g}, ce qui fait sortir sa progéniture à la surface. Elle utilise également cette {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacité{/g} pendant son {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} si aucune cible ne se trouve sur un sol meuble.
languages.original_text: Once the ambull mother loses a third of her {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximum wounds{/g} (and later, once she loses two thirds), she immediately uses {g|f:0c133569641d4e079d914963cebe015d}Burrow{/g}, causing her brood to emerge to the surface. She also uses this {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} during her {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} if no targets are located on loose ground.

traits.locale_text: Quand la mère ambull perd un tiers de ses {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}blessures maximum{/g} (puis quand elle en perd deux tiers), elle utilise immédiatement {g|f:0c133569641d4e079d914963cebe015d}Enfouissement{/g}, ce qui fait sortir sa progéniture à la surface. Elle utilise également cette {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacité{/g} pendant son {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} si aucune cible ne se trouve sur un sol meuble.

languages.text: アンブルマザーがその{g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}最大の傷{/g}の1/3を失うと（後に、2/3を失うと）、即座に{g|f:0c133569641d4e079d914963cebe015d}穴を掘る{/g}を使用し、巣族が地表に現れる。緩んだ地面にターゲットがいない場合も、その{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}にこの{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}を使用する。
languages.original_text: Once the ambull mother loses a third of her {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximum wounds{/g} (and later, once she loses two thirds), she immediately uses {g|f:0c133569641d4e079d914963cebe015d}Burrow{/g}, causing her brood to emerge to the surface. She also uses this {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} during her {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} if no targets are located on loose ground.

traits.locale_text: アンブルマザーがその{g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}最大の傷{/g}の1/3を失うと（後に、2/3を失うと）、即座に{g|f:0c133569641d4e079d914963cebe015d}穴を掘る{/g}を使用し、巣族が地表に現れる。緩んだ地面にターゲットがいない場合も、その{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}にこの{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}を使用する。

languages.text: Verliert die Ambullenmutter ein Drittel ihrer {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximalen Wunden{/g} (bzw. zwei Drittel), setzt sie sofort {g|f:0c133569641d4e079d914963cebe015d}Eingraben{/g} ein, um ihre Brut an die Oberfläche zu holen. Sie setzt diese {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeit{/g} auch während ihres {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zuges{/g} ein, wenn sich keine Ziele auf lockerem Boden befinden.
languages.original_text: Once the ambull mother loses a third of her {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximum wounds{/g} (and later, once she loses two thirds), she immediately uses {g|f:0c133569641d4e079d914963cebe015d}Burrow{/g}, causing her brood to emerge to the surface. She also uses this {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} during her {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} if no targets are located on loose ground.

traits.locale_text: Verliert die Ambullenmutter ein Drittel ihrer {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximalen Wunden{/g} (bzw. zwei Drittel), setzt sie sofort {g|f:0c133569641d4e079d914963cebe015d}Eingraben{/g} ein, um ihre Brut an die Oberfläche zu holen. Sie setzt diese {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeit{/g} auch während ihres {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zuges{/g} ein, wenn sich keine Ziele auf lockerem Boden befinden.
